title: End of a Breakaway Era: Thomas De Gendt to Retire at Close of 2024
content:
De Gendt confirms 2024 will be his 16th and final season on the attack, sets sights on more wins ahead of retirement.

Read the full article at End of a Breakaway Era: Thomas De Gendt to Retire at Close of 2024 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
